Docs.summary: Assists formatters in selection of the serialization surrogate to delegate the serialization or deserialization process to.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A serialization surrogate gives the users an object that can handle the serialization requirements of a different object and can transform the serialized data if necessary.
## Examples The following code example shows how to make a serialization surrogate class that knows how to properly serialize or deserialize a class that is not itself serializable. In addition, this example also shows how to recover from a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>.
